document.full_text: electronic health records, according to a new study, can yield an environmental payoff. but the potential to reduce pollution depends on using the technology to change how work is done and care is delivered.
document.title: electronic health records: green or polluter?
lines_and_colors: electronic health records, according to a new study, can yield an environmental payoff. but the potential to reduce pollution depends on using the technology to change how work is done and care is delivered.
